mapper.select: SELECT top 10 a.shop_guid as shop_guid, a.SHOP_NAME AS enterprise_store_name, a.ADDRESS AS enterprise_store_addr, substring(a.TEL,0,20) AS enterprise_store_phone, a.LXR AS enterprise_store_man, a.CREATETIME AS enterprise_store_add_time, a.SHOP_NAME AS enterprise, REPLACE(case when c.unitName not in ('思明分局','湖里分局','集美分局','翔安分局','海沧分局','同安分局') then '市辖区' else c.unitName end , '分局', '区') AS area_county, '厦门市公安局交通警察支队'+REPLACE(case when c.unitName not in ('思明分局','湖里分局','集美分局','翔安分局','海沧分局','同安分局') then '直属' else c.unitName end , '分局', '')+'大队' as police_county FROM tab_Shop a LEFT JOIN tab_UnitInfo b ON a.unitId = b.unitId LEFT JOIN tab_UnitInfo c ON c.unitId = b.parentId where b.agencyCode like '35%' and a.SHOP_GUID is not null and a.RESOURCETYPE=1 and a.SHOP_GUID!='845A7007089242189633BBE0BBA8C477' and (a.del_flag is null or a.del_flag=0) ORDER BY a.CREATETIME
